title: Arun Jaitley is in good health: Piyush Goyal
article_body: NEW DELHI: Union Minister is in "good health" and will soon be resuming his duties, Finance Minister said on Thursday. Goyal has been given the charge of finance ministry after Jaitley relinquished the portfolio due to health reasons. Speaking in the while moving two resolutions related to his ministry, Goyal said "I want to inform the House that Arunji is in good health and soon he shall be with us." Jaitley, who is Leader of the , today made his maiden appearance during the current session. He also participated in the election for the Rajya Sabha Deputy Chairman and spoke briefly. PTI JTR KR ARC ARC
